mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.code AS "code", a.sccode AS "sccode", a.sclinecode AS "sclinecode", a.cinvcode AS "cinvcode", a.cinvname AS "cinvname", a.cinvstd AS "cinvstd", a.num AS "num", a.unit AS "unit", a.cangku AS "ck.id", a.bgid AS "bgid", a.bgcode AS "bgcode", a.planid AS "planid", a.plancode AS "plancode", a.sych AS "sych", a.remarks AS "remarks", ck.name AS "ck.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_chuku_lingliao( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, code, sccode,sclinecode, cinvcode, cinvname, cinvstd, num, unit, cangku, bgid, bgcode, planid, plancode, sych, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{code}, #{sccode},#{sclinecode}, #{cinvcode}, #{cinvname}, #{cinvstd}, #{num}, #{unit}, #{ck.id}, #{bgid}, #{bgcode}, #{planid}, #{plancode}, #{sych}, #{remarks} )
